name: Battle Planner
text: Your study of heroes and combat has made you exceptionally suited for directing allies to their most advantageous positions.
benefit: When using the inspire action ability to grant an extra move action, you can affect all allies within 30 feet.
text_zh: 你对英雄与战斗的研究，让你特别善于引导盟友到他们最有利的位置上呆着。
benefit_zh: 当你使用激发行动来给予额外的移动动作时，你可以改为影响30尺内的所有盟友。
